meanings.sent1: I love to eat nanas for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She packed a nanas in her lunchbox.
meanings.sent3: The monkey slipped on a nanas peel!
meanings.sent4: The nanas in the fruit bowl were ripe and sweet.
meanings.sent5: The nanas at the market were yellow and delicious.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'nana', meaning grandmother.
meanings.sent1: My nanas always bakes the best cookies.
meanings.sent2: We visited our nanas during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My nanas tells the funniest jokes.
meanings.sent4: She is the queen of our family, our nanas.
meanings.sent5: I cherish the memories with my nanas.
